name: Figure Action
ShortInfo: An action figure is a poseable character model figure made most commonly of plastic, and often based upon characters from a film, comic book, military, ...

name: Montessori toys
ShortInfo: A Montessori toy is one that stimulates learning by encouraging kids to experiment.

name: Book and Magazine
ShortInfo: Manga, comics, magazines and many other things...

name: Role play toys
ShortInfo: Our pretend play range is full of wooden toys that are fun, and that also encourage children to develop their social and speech skills through play.

name: Musical
ShortInfo: Playing with musical toys helps to teach patience and persistence.

name: Movement toys
ShortInfo: movement toys require and encourage big movements.

name: Small world toys
ShortInfo: Doll's houses, play farms and other settings inspired by the real world are classic examples of small world toys.

name: Wooden toys
ShortInfo: A wooden toy is a toy constructed primarily from wood and wood products.
